meters /50 grams pony beads 2 cases of pony beads with 18 colors in each case and 2 300 beads total in each case each pony bead is 6x9mm and has a 4mm opening you will need 242-302 beads of each of the 18 colors purchase the pony beads on amazon here 2 cases required https //amzn to/3tpxww9 the sample used 2 of these cases of pony beads from the beadery on amazon or hello hobby brand from walmart they are the same purchase these pony beads on amazon here https //amzn to/3tpxww9 18 colors in this case of beads top row from left to right glitter purple glitter blue glitter green glitter yellow glitter orange and glitter pink middle row from left to right purple blue green yellow orange and pink bottom row from left to right pearl purple pearl blue pearl green pearl yellow pearl orange and pearl pink pattern notes the mat is symmetrical from left to right and from bottom to top it is made with single_crochet stitches in us terms the starting chain 1 does not count as a stitch to work a bead single_crochet put a bead on the hook before making a single_crochet stitch as usual to modify the pattern to make it larger or smaller add or subtract any multiple of 3 to the starting chain tutorial video https //youtu be/b5lj8tfuhj8 adding a bead the bead single_crochet stitch place a bead on the hook before inserting the hook into the next stitch yarn over and pull through the stitch yarn over and pull through both loops on the hook and the bead at the same time it helps to hold the bead steady with your other hand while you pull the yarn through there will always be 2 single_crochet stitches in between each bead and 2 single_crochet stitches at the start and end of each row if your hook does not pull through the bead smoothly try using a smaller hook or thinner
